ComicInfo.Title: Space Opera Act 2: Out of The Silent Planet
ComicInfo.Summary: The Road to Chaos noted on cover Special thanks to Hasbro's Aaron Archer, Michael Kelly, Amie Lozanski, Val Roca, Ed Lane, Michael Provost, Erin Hillman, Jos Huxley, Samantha Lomow, and Michael Verrechia for their invaluable assistance.Space Opera Act 2: Out of The Silent Planet: Hot Rod and Wheelie land on Cybertron, where they encounter Ironhide and Sunstreaker alongside a trained Insecticon. Unfortunately, the happy reunion is cut short when Hot Rod sees Galvatron, and knows big trouble's on the horizon. The Autobots and alien castaway then take off towards Earth in hopes of finding reinforcements to help them w/Galvatron and his forces.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-03-22 17:23:16. [Issue ID 841184]
